sentences.english: A couple days ago she attended the P&G Communitys new product release press conference.
sentences.chinese: 前兩天她還剛剛出席了寶潔公司的一次新品發佈會。

sentences.english: A: Yes, I do. I have worked as a salesman for P&G Company Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 有，我在寶潔公司做過促銷員。

sentences.english: The firm is now attempting to develop new products that can counter the effects.
sentences.chinese: 寶潔公司正致力於開發對抗皮膚老化的新產品。

sentences.english: Product supply is the place translates innovation to reality.
sentences.chinese: 寶潔公司產品供應部就是見證創新，夢想成真的地方。

sentences.english: The deal also covers P& G's nutrition-enhancing food ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 該協議還包括寶潔的營養強化食品配料。

sentences.english: Technical research and innovation are the cornerstones of P&G's success.
sentences.chinese: 技術研究和創新是寶潔公司成功的基石。

sentences.english: P &G has 21 second brand, each brand has focused effect.
sentences.chinese: 寶潔有21個第二品牌，每個品牌都有聚焦效果。

sentences.english: Do you have any work experience in promotion? Yes, I do.
sentences.chinese: 有，我在寶潔公司做過促銷員。

sentences.english: Gupta also allegedly leaked information about P&G's corporate earnings.
sentences.chinese: 古普塔還涉嫌泄露了有關寶潔公司收益的信息。

sentences.english: The quality of products of P&G is first-class .
sentences.chinese: 寶潔公司的產品質量高。

sentences.english: Even P&G routinely whiffs with product rollouts.
sentences.chinese: 甚至寶潔在它的產品發佈上都是那老一套，令人厭惡。

sentences.english: But first, Garneau and Gamble need the parents' approval.
sentences.chinese: 但首先，加爾諾和寶潔需要徵求父母們的同意。

sentences.english: On the development of test items, P & G gradually into the original material testing.
sentences.chinese: 開發日化檢測項目，逐步導入寶潔原材的檢測。

sentences.english: P & G Company. Can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 這裏是寶潔公司，您有事嗎？

sentences.english: Armstrong Zhang, the General Manager, used to serve P&G China as HR Manager for seven years.
sentences.chinese: 總經理張力先生曾任寶潔公司人力資源經理長達七年。

sentences.english: I find Procter & Gamble’s one-page memo format very useful for this.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得寶潔公司的單頁備忘錄格式對此非常有用。
